meanings.definition: Capable of being counted or enumerated.
meanings.sent1: The denumerable amount of apples in the basket made it easy to divide them among the children.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the students to count the denumerable number of pencils on the desk.
meanings.sent3: The denumerable stars in the sky seemed to twinkle in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her denumerable patience was like a well-organized library, each moment neatly cataloged.
meanings.sent5: The denumerable rows of colorful flowers in the garden created a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: Able to be put into one-to-one correspondence with the natural numbers.
meanings.sent1: The denumerable set of chairs in the room matched perfectly with the number of guests invited.
meanings.sent2: Each book on the shelf had a denumerable label indicating its position in the library.
meanings.sent3: The denumerable pairs of socks in the drawer seemed to have a secret code for matching.
meanings.sent4: Her denumerable talents were like keys that unlocked different doors of opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The denumerable dots on the dice added up to a winning number in the game.
